record.text:
Got a #PowerShell blog?

Let us know the URL and we can add it to an upcoming release of #Posh.

Bring Out Your Blogs! (Feed Support Coming) 路 StartAutomating/Posh 路 Discussion #172 (github.com)

external.title: Bring Out Your Blogs! (Feed Support Coming) 路 StartAutomating/Posh 路 Discussion #172
external.description: In future versions of Posh, we'd like to add a .Feed to any module (#171). We'll be adding a simple integrated blog reader to help you find out news about a PowerShell and about a module. If you ha...
